comment._content: Otto Carl Wilhelm von Schjerning (* Oktober, 4, 1853 in Eberswalde; † Juni 28, 1921 in Berlin) He was chief of the German field medical service in WWI. de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Otto_von_Schjerning, in German
